title: What Do These 37 Authors Know About Vaccines That You Don't?
cleaned_text:
I’m sure by now you’ve heard that there are a multitude of problems and dangers with vaccines. However, I’m wondering if you are aware of just how many books have been written on the subject of vaccine safety? There are HEAPS! I went through the online Amazon book marketplace and found this lot of 37. I’m positive there are more but any others don’t have their subject in their title.

1 ‘Against Compulsory Vaccination: Why HPV Vaccines Are Dangerous To The Lives Of Girls, Young Women And Everyone Else’ by Kevin A. Muhammad

2 ‘Andrew Wakefield: Autism, and the Vaccine Debate’ by Megan Groeneveld

3 ‘Anyone who tells you vaccines are safe and effective is lying’ by Dr Vernon Coleman

4 ‘Callous Disregard: Autism and Vaccines: The Truth Behind a Tragedy’ by Dr Andrew J. Wakefield

7 ‘Evidence of Harm: Mercury in Vaccines and the Autism Epidemic: A Medical Controversy’ by David Kirby

9 ‘Human Medical Experimentation: From Smallpox Vaccines to Secret Government Programs’ by Frances Frankenburg

10 ‘Inoculated: How Science Lost its Soul in Autism’ by Kent Heckenlively

11 ‘Jabbed: How the Vaccine Industry, Medical Establishment and Government Stick It to You and Your Family’ by Brett Wilcox

13 ‘Master Manipulator: The Explosive True Story of Fraud, Embezzlement, and Government Betrayal at the CDC’ by James Ottar Grundvig

15 ‘Rising From The Dead’ by Suzanne Humphries

16 ‘The Global Elites Poisoning of the People’ by Terence A. Smart

18 ‘The Solution: Homeoprophylaxis: The Vaccine Alternative’ by Kate Birch and Cilla Whatcott

20 ‘The Vaccine Court: The Dark Truth of America’s Vaccine Injury Compensation Program’ by Wayne Rohde

21 ‘Thimerosal: Let the Science Speak: The Evidence Supporting the Immediate Removal of Mercury—a Known Neurotoxin—from Vaccines’ – by Robert F. Kennedy

 ‘Truth Wrapped in Lies (Hidden Deception Book 2)’ by E. A. Hargrave

22 ‘Vaccination Is Not Immunization 4th Ed. Fourth Edition’ by Tim O’Shea

23 ‘Vaccinations and Vaccine Myth Exposed: The reasons to be Afraid’ by Daniel Birk

24 ‘Vaccine A: The Covert Government Experiment That’s Killing Our Soldiers–and Why GI’s Are Only the First Victim’ by Gary Matsumoto

27 ‘Vaccine Epidemic: How Corporate Greed, Biased Science, and Coercive Government Threaten Our Human Rights, Our Health, and Our Children’ by Louise Kuo Habakus

30 ‘Vaccine Injuries: Documented Adverse Reactions to Vaccines’ by Lou Conte and Tony Lyons

31 ‘Vaccine Whistleblower: Exposing Autism Research Fraud at the CDC’ by Kevin Barry

32 ‘Vaccine-nation: Poisoning the Population, One Shot at a Time’ by Andreas Moritz

35 ‘Vaccines and Vaccination: The Dangerous Truth behind the Vaccine Epidemic and why Vaccination is not Immunization’ by Linda Keller

36 ‘WHAT IF?: I Harmed My Children?’ by Kelly CS Joh

37 ‘Agnotology in Vaccines’ Pixie Seymour (Yes, this is my contribution)

That’s right; 37 books about vaccine safety to help wake up the world about the dangers of vaccination. What are you waiting for? Get reading and sharing to help other people to protect themselves against this vile and dangerous practice.
